snippet.title: Perseverance: Part 1 - In the new graphic style
snippet.description:
Hello everyone!

Our forge is as busy as ever. Perseverance: Part 2 is coming closer and closer to its completion which brings us closer to launch. The results of our hard work so far are pretty awesome. Meanwhile, our team has prepared a noteworthy surprise! Hopefully, in the March 2021, you will be able to experience Perseverance: Part 1 in a new and fresh visual style.

Get Perseverance: Part 1 on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/854870/Perseverance_Part_1/

In Perseverance: Part 1 you play as Jack Cutter, a father who is struggling to keep his family together. He’s a ‘go-to’ guy in his hometown of Grey Ville. On the surface Grey Ville looks like a peaceful town, but research conducted in a nearby military base gives it a mysterious aura. Residents prefer to stay away from it, however, they love to speculate on what’s going on there. Things take an unexpected turn and the area is quarantined.

Follow us!
STUDIO WEBSITE - http://titanitegames.com/
STUDIO FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/titanitegames
STUDIO TWITTER - https://twitter.com/titanitegames
STUDIO INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/titanitegames


Also, if you are a fan of visual novel games, take a look at our accounts on this subject:
Titanite Novels FACEBOOK - https://www.facebook.com/titanitenovels
Titanite Novels TWITTER - https://twitter.com/titanitenovels
Titanite Novels INSTAGRAM - https://www.instagram.com/titanitenovels

Color: Michalina Wojna
